document_data.name: Jhalanessa Brithlar
document_data.refs2e: {{Cite web/Elminster Speaks archive|10}}{{Cite web/Elminster Speaks/Part 8: To Venerate The Great Mother}}
document_data.mainbody:
'''Jhalanessa Brithlar''' was a [[cleric]] of [[Chauntea]] with the rank of Watchful Sister who resided in the [[Bounty of the Goddess (Voonlar)|Bounty of the Goddess]] temple in [[Voonlar]] around [[1372 DR]].
__NOTOC__
document_data.Personality: She had a bit of a wild spirit that led to mischievousness and deep, passionate feelings about many things.
document_data.Abilities: Watchful Sister Jhalanessa was a horticulturist who specialized in herbalism for both humans and farm animals.
